page.title: 20A MESSAGE FROM 1985
page.content: Dear People of the Future,Greetings from the 20th Century.We're sending this message to you through The Domesday Disc.Children weren't as lucky 900 years ago as we are in our country today.We have good health,food toys,& education.However in many lands famine,war,disease are common. Bob Geldof and good people world wide are trying to help Africa,s great famine. The EEC has grain,butter and meat mountains and he has told them to help. This year we remembered the Last Battle on English soil.Today we worry about nuclear war'pollution and new diseases.We hope that in your time all of these problems will be solved and that there will be lasting peace.We are just begining to travel into space you may well take it as normal.We hope that peace will prevail there also.
